tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulted sir for fever. I could recover within 4 to 5 days. I could connect with doctor over a phone as well for my follow up. Thank you sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr Rajendra prasad for my eldery mothers fever treatment. He has diagnosed it very and well and she got recovered within 5 days

tags: None
review:
Visited the Doctor, ******* ** **** ***** **************** *** ***** ********* ** ******* *** ***** *** ********** **** ********** ** ********* **** **** ******* ***** ********* *** ******* *** **** * **** ** *** *** ****** ***** * ****. The doctor refused to check and very rudely told to go and pay the consultation first.
Despite seeking medical advice, I felt that Dr. Rajendra Prasad did not approach my concerns with the empathy and respect one expects from a healthcare professional. **** **** ** *************** was disheartening and has left me considering alternative healthcare providers for future patients.

tags: None
review: Its my mistake that I went to this Doctor without reading the reviews properly. I only checked his experience. He will always be on the mobile and not interested for check-up. *** *** ******** ******** *** **** ***** he is rude, not at all ready to listen, *********** ***** ** **** ** ** ***** ******* ****** ***** **** ***** ************* **** *** when u visit with the report, he will not bother ** ***** ** ********* won’t listen, prescribe **** ****** medications and will finish everything in just 2-3 mins. Will not respond to your questions. You will end up visiting another Doctor in 3-4 days. So save your time and money *** ****** ******* *** ******** ****** ** *** ***** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr Rajendra prasad sir for my fever treatment after consulting two different doctors because i didnt get relief. Dr Rajendra prasad has diagnosed it correctly and given treatment. I recovered within 3 days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Like everyone I was also searching for good physician doctor in my area and I found him through practo and I feel lucky, He is very good doctor, He identified the issue and gave medicine wisely.
Now I can connect with him in future as well in case of any other medical consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr Rajendra prasad sir for Fever treatment. He listens very patiently to all the queries. I got diagnosed with the dengue and got recovered with his treatment within 3 to 4 days

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: 1.apollo booked our appointment for rajendra prasad S while stating him as rajendra sharma. 2. extremely unfriendly. we felt very uncomfortable for the 1 minute he spent on us 3. we had to take second opinion outside as he made us nervous with his diagnosis. finally ended up takiing different medicines from what he prescribed** ** **** *********** *** ********** *** ** ******* ******* ** * ***** **** ** *** ** ******* *** **** ** ******** ***** ** **** ** ** *** ******* ** *** **** **** ** ****** ** ******** ******* ** *** **** **** *** ******* ******* **** *** **** *** ******* ** *** *** **** * ************

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife went to him for throat discomfort and pain. He analysed her and prescribed her some medicines for gargling and flu related. He insisted that we go to a specific pharmacy to get the medicines and gave a small note for the pharmacy. When we reached the pharmacy, the attendant took that note from us and verified the doctor name and gave us medicines. One of the tablet was for 500rs. * *** ******* *** ******* *** *** ******* ** **** ********* *** ** *** ****** ** * ********** *** ***** **** *** * ****** ***** We immediately left that place and went to a ENT *** ** ****** *** ** ** ********* ******* **************** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Went due to flu symptoms,Dr did not ask enough questions and didn't give any diagnosis,when I went back to ask him about it he rudely turned me away,saying he was treating other patients.
***** ** *** **** *** *** **** ****** **** ******* ********* ** ********** **** ** ************* ** *** ,why would you speak so rude to a sick patient .
₹750 is an exorbitant amount of for the kind of patient care provided by this doctor.
Not going back.

review: Unprofessional behaviour, ****** ******* ** ** ******* **** **** *** *** ** ******* ******  ***** **** ****** ******* After prescribing medicine if you will not feel better and want to contact  doctor for follow up he will not respond to your call and messages.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from cold sores and was unable to get right treatment.But Dr Prasad was so kind genuine that he examined me throughly and explained me what needs to be done.He started my medication and diagnosed it.I am thankful for him , he has been a great dr I have ever come across.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor seems to be hurry didn't even listened to issue before suggesting 4-6 test costing upward of 6000 then once report came did not even responded. Another booked appointment was cancelled, had to change doctor ** *** ****** ********** Extremely dissatisfied with unprofessional *** *********** **********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had appointment with Dr Rajendra Prasad,but when i reached the clinic, he was not available, instead his junior doctor treated me. ** *** ************* ********** ** ******* *** ********* *** ********* ************ ***** *** ******* ** ******** ****** *** ******* ** *** ******** if he is not available, atleast that can be mentioned when i am booking him on Practo.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My wife consulted this doc for general fever & cough , ******* ******** ******** doctor prescribes  to do Urine test ,Dengue test ,Liver test and stone check and apollo clinic quoted me 4000rs apart from doctor 600rs .Pls don’t go to appollo clinic

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to him with a very high fever. But he diagnosed a heart murmur and suggested ECG, EEG and Echo asap. He also said my fever could be some kind of new flu and prescribed ***** flu medication (more than 5 tablets). I did not take the medication or the scan. ** ***** *********** *** **** *** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Absolutely unfriendly doctor, he did not listen to the problem. He never understood the complete issue nor did he explain the medication he is prescribing…even though we were next due, he wanted to prioritise another patient and was rude that we eventually did take our turn.

tags: None
review: We went to the clinic on time but the waiting time is high. After going into the room , doctor just involved into his phone. He doesn't explained why the cough and cold is there and fever too! & Didn't aked any sort of questions like dry cough or cold cough. Just givn DOLO650 for 10days. * ***** **** ********* *** ** **** ** *** ******** ****** ***** No value for time and  money as well. Very disappointed with the doctor. I don't recommend to anyone.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor didn't come to hospital, high level of  mismanagement from Apollo. Called two time and provided wrong information about doctor's availability. Then I consulta with another Dr. *** ****** **** ************ *** **** ***** I could have done better use of my time and money rather going to this hospital.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited Dr. Rajendra for treating pain legs due Uric acid. I had done the blood test from thyrocare and gone to visit him but he said he doesnt want to start the treatment with the blood report from a bad lab. He was shouting at me and saying you should spend more and do test and prescribed new blood tests and the cost would be 15000 Rs it seems. ****** **** *** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: This doctor really needs to be more compassionate towards his patients. ******* ** ************* *** ***** ** *** ****** he was interested in just finishing the examination and sending us out. When i tried telling him about the other medicines i was taking, he hardly paid any attention. Do not visit this doctor ** *** **** * *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Not approachable. Don’t explain the health issue. Too arrogant *** **** ******* ****** ******* ******* *** ****** ***** *** ***** *** *********** When asked about details told to ask at medical shop. Visit patients in like 5 minutes and seems no interest to care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Not at all approachable. Directly asked for dengu test then next day for B12 test which could have done with dengu test itself. So clearly not recommanded. He was not ready to listen to the patient at all. Only tests he had asked but not suggested for what shall we intake to avoide fever or blood paltelet.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is not at all approachable.. He does not want to explain the need to have so many medicines that he prescribes and not properly said the need of each medicine**** ***** ** ***** ** **** ** **** ** ***** ***** ** ******* ********** ********** As a patient I have every right to know about the test and medicine when I enquire about anything he will say just follow the prescription and will say ask the relevant questions.. such a unprofessional doctor I never seen..

review: Bad place. mandatory rs.100 fee and mobile number for registration. then  starts the unending sms and calls. sells their own pathology package. worst experience ever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: There are very few GPs like Dr. Prasad in this era of super specialised health care services. Definitely recommend a visit for any generic health issue or symptoms you make have that needs answering/direction.
